meanings.definition: The act of registering or the state of being registered.
meanings.sent1: Many people completed their registrations for the event online.
meanings.sent2: The registrations for the workshop are filling up quickly.
meanings.sent3: The registrations for the race were so excited, they jumped into the computer!
meanings.sent4: Her registrations in the system were like stars in the night sky, each one shining brightly.
meanings.sent5: The registrations fluttered around the room like colorful butterflies, each one unique and important.

meanings.definition: An official list or record of names or items.
meanings.sent1: The school keeps detailed registrations of all the students' information.
meanings.sent2: The registrations of attendees were carefully checked at the entrance.
meanings.sent3: The registrations on the paper seemed to have a secret dance party when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: His registrations in the book were like soldiers standing in perfect formation.
meanings.sent5: The registrations in the database were like puzzle pieces, fitting perfectly together to create a complete picture.
